list_definition.definition: to make (musical sounds) with one’s voice

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I could hear the birds singing in the trees.

list_ex_of_english: By shedding excess and approaching sung dialogue as if it were speech, singers were to be singing actors - the imperative of a musical dramatic art.
Their songs are conceived and sung in a natural landscape; moreover, this natural landscape participates by echoing back their music.
He had a few lessons, and went away able to sing.
Unfortunately, no singing teacher was available then to help cope with the vocal demands of the piece.

Operatic characters do indeed sing all the time, but what they sing are not always songs.

The impact of singing on children's psychological state and well-being was investigated with a participant population of 76 pre-pubertal children.
